game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Berlin brings players to the vibrant EDM scene and landmarks of Berlin, playable online unblocked with new characters, outfits, boards, and city-themed collectibles.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Berlin â€“ Dash Through the Musical Streets of Germany

Subway Surfers: Berlin immerses players in Berlin's iconic streets and EDM scene. Run, jump, and slide along city tracks, dodging trains, barriers, and collecting coins, musical items, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: Berlin?

This edition is part of the World Tour series, featuring Berlin cityscapes, the EDM music theme, a limited-edition musician character named Nina with her Cyberpunk Outfit, and the Rockstar hoverboard.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Berlin?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & Musical Items: Gather coins, musical-themed collectibles, and other items to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, barriers, and Berlin-themed hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Berlin Unblocked?

Experience the musical streets and iconic landmarks of Berlin in Subway Surfers: Berlin online without restrictions, unlock new characters, outfits, boards, and city-themed collectibles.

Key Features

  • Berlin Environment: Explore famous city landmarks like the Brandenburg Gate and vibrant EDM-themed streets.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Unlock Nina with her Cyberpunk Outfit and the Rockstar hoverboard.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with a musical, Berlin twist.
  • Special Collectibles: Collect musical items for Weekly Hunt rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Berlin's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Berlin to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the musical city environment!
